name: Simple Adventures (BETA)
description:
An infinite jumper where you discover different worlds!

Use arrow keys or your mouse pointer to move. 

Everything here is TESTED and is possible!

---- The Story ----

Bob- the ball, is on a mission to conquer the different worlds in Bonville, after his long-lost brother Bun tried it, but never came back.

Go on a breathtaking journey to help Bob reach his target while showing your skills along the way!

Good Luck!

--Current levels: 17

Features coming —? —

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

 Download the file and go to Scratch (search it in your browser), now click "Create" in the top left corner. Now click the file icon, click  "Load from Computer", find the file there, and click open. Finally, click the green flag to play/end the game.
